buildings.name: Fishery
buildings.description: Catch and process fish from nearby waters. Fishermen supply food and crafting materials.

tiers.flavorText: Deep sea salts heal grievous wounds.
The sea heals your critical wounds.
The leviathan's blessing on each crit.
Fish oil makes you harder to hit.
Manta ray essence flows around you.
Slaying enemies washes away all debuffs.
Ocean waves heal the whole party.
Tsunami of healing washes over allies.
Eternal waters flow through you on kills.
The sea refuses to let you drown.
